name: Sol's Hunt
description:
A monster has boarded the ship and you are rushing to escape via the escape pods in room 00.  Escape pods can only be accessed by finishing the data transfer. This can done by accessing the terminals and using them as a relay . Once the first relay is set up doors the monster. Be careful the monster deactivates terminals.

You can also arm turrets those these only seem to slow the creature down. With your options limited. Your best hope is that you do not run out of space.

Controls

A : Move Left  D : Move Right E : Interact H: Hide/Show Help
